titleproper.value: Guide to the Time Inc. <title render="italic">Money</title> Editorial Records: Managing Editor Marshall Loeb Files<lb/>1981-1986<lb/> <num>MS 3009-RG 11</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-11-26T21:29:45</date>

unittitle.value: Time Inc. <title render="italic">Money</title> Editorial Records: Managing Editor Marshall Loeb Files

abstract.value: The Time Inc. <title render="italic">Money</title> Editorial Records: Managing Editor Marshall Loeb Files focus on  public appearances made by Loeb while he was managing editor. The collection is primarily scripts and transcripts.

p.value: Open to qualified researchers. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use.
This collection should be cited as Time Inc. <title render="italic">Money</title> Editorial Records: Managing Editor Marshall Loeb Files, MS 3009-RG 11, New-York Historical Society.
Personnel and Organization: Department Head Lists. Time Inc. Reference Files (MS 3009-RG 3), The New-York Historical Society.

The Time Inc. <title render="italic">Money</title> Editorial Records: Managing Editor Marshall Loeb Files focus on  public appearances made by Loeb while he was managing editor. The record group is primarily scripts for the CBS radio show <title render="italic">Your Dollars</title>. Additionally, there are scripts for Loeb's television and radio appearances and transcripts of his speeches and roundtable discussions in which he was a participant along with notes and statistical reports.

subject.value: Publishers and publishing -- New York (State) -- New York.
